column4: Guys I've got a bit of a problem that I tried to have answered before but didn't get too much of an answer.  I am working on downloading this program.  I got a .tar.gz file and when I extracted, it gave me a folder.  Where do I go from here?
or look for and install.txt inside the folder

it gave me this:  cmake . (If you want to install in a different path, use instead: cmake . -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=/install/path) make  To install, become root:  sudo make install (enter root password at prompt)
ok just type in a terminal window cd /home/kelbizzle/path-to-folder
then type sudo make then sudo make install
make: *** No rule to make target `install'.  Stop.
cmon m8 lets go hit Microsoft.
sorry it still says this:  make: *** No rule to make target `install'.  Stop.
I attempted in another root shell (not that it'd help) and it still gives me that.
